title: Design and synthesis of novel main protease inhibitors of COVID-19: quinoxalino[2,1-b]quinazolin-12-ones
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29122-29133
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06025C, Paper
Open Access

Atefeh Tirehdast, Seddigheh Sheikhi-Mohammareh, Hossein Sabet-Sarvestani, Michael G. Organ, Volodymyr Semeniuchenko, Ali Shiri
Aiming to discover potent inhibitors targeting 3CLpro, an efficient procedure has been established for the synthesis of novel quinoxalino[2,1-b]quinazolin-12-ones.
